data.title: Ekin Caglar on LinkedIn: I'm thrilled to announce that I've joined T&Pùëö as Global Chief Technology‚Ä¶
data.meta_description:
I'm thrilled to announce that I've joined T&Pùëö as Global Chief Technology Officer.

T&Pùëö is an independent agency network with a 1900-strong‚Ä¶ | 68 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
We‚Äôre delighted to be working with Virgin Media Ireland on their digital transformation; great people at VMIE, a great programme team from Infosys, and a great example of headless BSS within a wider transformation programme. Integrating in to the BSS through the APIs allows VMIE to retain the best of their existing engagement layer whilst benefitting from all of the pre-integration at the fulfilment layer (catalogue, orchestration, charging, and billing). Made possible by the Cerillion Enterprise Catalogue (EPC) unifying the upstream feed of products to the multiple sales systems, and the service catalogue and rules to the Cerillion fulfilment. All of this benefits from the use of TM Forum Open APIs (catalogue, sales, order) to simplify the integration with the VMIE sales and CRM systems, including Pegasystems. Delivered from our EU private cloud, the convergent BSS for VMIE will support their fixed, mobile, and TV product lines, converging separate legacy platforms in to one solution. If you would like to know more about benefitting from Cerillion‚Äôs commitment to Open APIs, deploying Cerillion in a headless mode, or why we‚Äôre consistently at the top of the Real World Certifications then do come and see us at DTW - Ignite in Copenhagen next week. #VMIE #DigitalTransformation #BSSOSS #OpenAPI #TMForum

Did you know that Delivery Roadmaps and Service Blurprints are two of the core services that we offer at Impact Signal?! While the two may seem similar at first glance, there's a few key differences and plenty of benefits to creating both of these deliverables! Follow the link below find out more about how we use Delivery Roadmaps at Impact Signal and how they can help your business: https://ow.ly/G0zx50QqW4J #servicedesign #humancentreddesign

üöÄ Exciting News! Digital First Division Launched! üöÄ I'm thrilled to announce the official launch of Digital First! Last month, I shared my new role as COO, leading this groundbreaking division. Are you seeking team alignment, streamlined processes, and an extra 4 hours each week? Connect with us at Digital First. Book a brainstorming session with Alice to explore how we can assist. Connect with us here on LinkedIn, follow our page for the latest insights, and let our team help you unleash your full potential. Let's collaborate to revolutionize your approach! üåü Are you ready? #DigitalFirst #TeamAlignment #Efficiency #Innovation#ChangeManagement#OperationalExcellence
